title: Katie Price tries to hit the jackpot as she buys lottery tickets amid bankruptcy woes
text:
Katie Price was spotted buying lottery tickets on Thursday after it emerged she could be bankrupt before Christmas.

The television personality, 41, popped into a newsagents near her house in West Sussex to take a gamble on Friday's lottery.

Katie, who hasn't kept up with her Individual Voluntary Agreement over her estimated £250,000 debts, tried her luck at the £3.8million jackpot in the hope of some good fortune.
